sampleData.title: RAG System Setup Session - December 9, 2025 (Part 1)
sampleData.summary: TRAJANUS RAG SYSTEM SETUP SESSION - December 9, 2025 EXECUTIVE SUMMARY: Tonight we completed the setup of a permanent AI...
sampleData.content:
TRAJANUS RAG SYSTEM SETUP SESSION - December 9, 2025

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY:
Tonight we completed the setup of a permanent AI memory system using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). 
After an 8-hour marathon session, we successfully deployed a Supabase PostgreSQL database with pgvector 
extension, integrated OpenAI embeddings API, and created a complete pipeline for storing and retrieving 
knowledge across Claude sessions.

KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
- Supabase database created with vector search capabilities
- Complete schema with 4 agentic RAG functions deployed
- Folder structure established (13-Knowledge-Base with 9 categories)
- OpenAI embeddings API integrated and tested
- Python dependencies resolved and verified
- End-to-end pipeline tested and operational

TECHNICAL DETAILS:
The system uses text-embedding-3-small model from OpenAI to generate 1536-dimension vectors for semantic 
search. Content is chunked into 1000-character segments with 200-character overlap to preserve context.

sampleData.title: 2025-12-10_Technical_Journal_RAG_Complete (Part 1)
sampleData.summary: # Technical Journal - December 10, 2025 ## RAG Knowledge Base System - Final Implementation **Session Date:** December 9-10, 2025...
sampleData.content:
# Technical Journal - December 10, 2025
## RAG Knowledge Base System - Final Implementation

**Session Date:** December 9-10, 2025 (17:00 - 02:45)  
**Duration:** 9 hours 45 minutes  
**Session Type:** Marathon Development - System Completion

---

## SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE FINALIZED

### Database Layer - Supabase PostgreSQL
```
Database: Supabase PostgreSQL 15
Extension: pgvector (vector similarity search)
Table: knowledge_base
- Primary key: id (BIGSERIAL)
- Content fields: url, chunk_number, title, summary, content
- Search field: embedding vector(1536)
- Metadata: JSONB with source, category, filters
- Timestamps: created_at, updated_at with auto-update trigger
```

**Critical Configuration:**
- RLS (Row Level Security): DISABLED after blocking inserts
- Vector Index: IVFFlat with 100 lists for cosine similarity
- Functions: 4 specialized RAG query functions

### Embedding Layer - OpenAI
```
Model: text-embedding-3-small
Dimensions: 1536
Cost: $0.02 per 1M tokens
Performance: ~3 secon

Other docs from session:

```

### Environment Configuration
```
.env file contains:
SUPABASE_URL=[Bill's project URL]
SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=[service_role key]
OPENAI_API_KEY=[with $10 billing enabled]

Verify these exist before running any scripts!
```

---

## CRITICAL BUGS RESOLVED (Don't Re-Encounter)

### 1. RLS Blocking Writes
**What happened:** Row Level Security silently blocked inserts  
**Solution:** `ALTER TABLE knowledge_base DISABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;`  
**Don't:** Re-enable RLS without proper service_role policy

### 2. Function Overloading Conflict  
**What happened:** Two match_knowledge_base() versions caused PGRST203  
**Solution:** Drop all versions, create single canonical function  
**Don't:** Add parameters to existing functions - create new functions instead

### 3.
